name: Font Share
description: Fontshare is a free fonts service from the Indian Type Foundry (ITF), making quality fonts accessible to all.

name: Typescale
description: Create a scaled type system with your fonts

name: Fonts Ninja
description: Fonts Ninja helps designers discover awesome fonts and create stunning designs. Explore thousands of fonts and download them for free or buy premium ones.

name: Font Mojo
description: Fontmojo is a simple app to preview, compare, and organize fonts.

name: Open Foundry
description: A new platform for open-source fonts in a noise-free environment, to highlight their beauty, extend functionality and encourage further exploration.

name: Use & Modify
description: a personal selection of beautiful, classy, punk, professional, incomplete, weird typefaces. Open source licenses make them free to use and modify. This selection is the result of deep search and crushes.

name: SPACE TYPE GENERATOR
description: Generate 3D text effects in the browser
